title: Chieftains
description: Deli/Cafe. Delicious smoked stuff, cheeses, olives, hot sauces, outrageously tasty sandwiches.

title: Killik
description: Gin/rum distillery, brewery. Burger and other food goodness in a super hip venue.

title: The General Food Store
description: Cafe. Everything is delicious, seasonal, yum. But really, our favourite eating place.

title: The Fat Goat
description: Super cool micro pub, all the craft beers ever. Jon might DJ there!

title: Micawber Tavern
description: Pub. Open fires, beer garden/forest, live music, good pub food.

title: Maria
description: Cafe. South American inspired tasty crap. Good coffee.

title: Earthly Pleasures
description: Cafe. Ben claims it's the best coffee he has ever had. Beautiful setting, tasty food.

title: Sooki Lounge
description: Bar/restaurant/cafe. Cool venue, live music, trivia!

title: Proserpina Bakehouse
description: Bakery/cafe. Baked goods, fresh sourdough bread, best tarts.
location: 361 Mount Dandenong Tourist Rd, Sassafras VIC 3787

title: The Railyard
description: Cafe by day, bar by night. Live music, skate videos, cool man works there.

title: Storehouse Roastery
location: 1544 Mount Dandenong Tourist Rd, Olinda VIC 3788
